spell_list.description: This spell is applied to the target ally and cannot be cast on the defiler. It reduces the defilers max health and grants the target a health increase. If the target ally dies while this spell is active, their group will receive damage reduction for a short duration. This spell has no reuse if it is toggled off manually. This spell can be cast while casting other spells.
spell_list.description_pvp: This spell is applied to the target ally and cannot be cast on the defiler. It reduces the defilers max health and grants the target a health increase. If the target ally dies while this spell is active, their group will receive damage reduction for a short duration. This spell has no reuse if it is toggled off manually. This spell can be cast while casting other spells.

effect_list.description: On death this spell will cast Spiritual Sacrifice on target.  Lasts for 7.5 seconds.
Applies to each group member of the player who died
Reduces all damage done to target by 70%
Cannot be modified except by direct means
Increases Max Health of target by 10.0%
Decreases Max Health of caster by 10.0%

spell_list.name: Spiritual Sacrifice
